author: fruitmix
content: Why is `GENESIS_DELAY` 7 days? Is it for security or to prepare for something?

author: protolambda
content: So far we had minutes-hours for small test nets, then 1 day genesis delay for public nets, then tried 4, and it really just turned out more time is better. The genesis state will be set for those days, and everyone can make sure their node is up and running, and double check if everything is ok before actual genesis.
